title: ATypI 2007 Brighton Updates
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20070921100523/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 6.Aug.2007 12.57pm 

. . . . . .  
ATypI 2007 - Brighton, U.K.  
September 12-16, 2007  
Hands On 07

. . . . . .  
_News and updates_

- Register now! Early bird registration ends August 14

- TDC and SOTA Exhibits

- Poster session

- In celebration of our 50th anniversary, 5 additional T-shirts available for purchase at the conference designed by:  
 - Johanna Bilak (thanks to Maarten Idema for the DrawBot2 scripting)  
 - Neville Brody  
 - Ale Paul  
 - Lawrence Zeegen  
 - Juliet Shen  
 Designs will be available to view soon.

- Program highlights:  
 - 2 days of TypeTech Forum to include a track by FontLab and Dutch Type Library  
 - 3 days of concurrent sessions in the main program  
 - Keynote presentations to include talks by Richard Hollis, Humphrey Stone, David Crow, Ken Garland, James Mosley, Matthew Carter, and Michael Harvey  
 For complete TypeTech program details, see: [http://www.atypi.org/05\_Brighton/typetech/20\_main\_programt](http://web.archive.org/web/20070921100523/http:/www.atypi.org/05_Brighton/typetech/20_main_programt "http://www.atypi.org/05\_Brighton/typetech/20\_main\_programt")

For main program details, see: [http://www.atypi.org/05\_Brighton/20\_main\_program](http://web.archive.org/web/20070921100523/http:/www.atypi.org/05_Brighton/20_main_program "http://www.atypi.org/05\_Brighton/20\_main\_program")

- Opening reception to include a film screening

- Auction and Garden Party events

- 4 optional tours as well a free lettering walk around Brighton

And much more....

- For registration details and to sign up for the conference, visit the ATypI Store at: [http://www.atypi.org/store](http://web.archive.org/web/20070921100523/http:/www.atypi.org/store "http://www.atypi.org/store")

. . . . . .  
For questions and more information, please send email to secretariat (at) atypi.org
author: Miss Tiffany
